QuestData.Title: Return to Karazhan: In the Eye of the Beholder
QuestData.Description: The Legion's intentions are clear. They intend to harness the tower's magical energy to communicate with other Legion worlds!$B$BI'm afraid we haven't much time, $n. You must ascend the tower and destroy this monstrosity before it is too late!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Viz'aduum the Watcher in Karazhan.
